view.status:
You find a massive cave rat hiding among the rocks. The gray fur serves well as camoflage, but now that you've gotten close enough the game of hide and seek is over.

Now it's time for a game of eat or be eaten.

lines.help:
Health.
When your health drops to zero, you will be force to rewind to your last rest point. Over time, nutrition converts to stamina and then to health.

Stamina.
When your stamina drops to zero, you will need to digest food to recover. Some actions spend stamina, and also it converts to health over time.

Nutrition.
Eat food to fill up so you can recover and heal.
